title: Two frames: Portrait of Edward Schwerin, wearing herringbone suit jacket, light colored necktie with decoration, light colored hat with dark band, and eyeglasses, standing in front of flecked stone wall; Portrait of Louisa Jackson, wearing light colored button down coat, dark hat, and eyeglasses, holding paper bag, standing in front of Reserved for People's Cab sign on Liberty Avenue, with pedestrians and May Building with Thrift Drugs store in background
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
